updates.title: Wellness
updates.message:
Since COVID-19 pandemic restrictions were lifted, we have been joyfully working at full capacity.  We are grateful for the consideration our patients have shown us in regard to proactively rescheduling when not feeling well.  Thank you!

That said, please call us right away if you have an urgent dental need before your next checkup. We are always ready for phone calls to 610-345-0267, emails to SCCFD08@gmail.com, and through this app's Virtual Forms.
